fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Police a target’s house and prevent anyone who targeted them tonight from visiting.
- Send your patrol dog to a separate target’s house. The patrol dog will bite any visitors who try to attack the target. You will learn if and how many targets were bit, but will not learn their names.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you prevent the visit from someone who has been bit, you will notice the bite mark and learn their name as feedback.
- If you send your patrol dog to the same house you are policing, you will both guard each other. You gain Basic defense for the night and the patrol dog will bite any of your attacking visitors in addition to the original target’s. You will notice the bite marks of anyone who visits you or your target. You may only do this once.
